alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 30 at 7:54PM PST until December 01 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 3 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph in the hills, except 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph closer to the coast. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 3 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range
